settings.boxContent: To experience behno White Glove Client Services, or if you have any questions, text "HELLO" to us. We strive to text back ASAP.
For assistance concerning our online store or your online purchase, please contact us via email. This is the easiest way to get in touch with us.

settings.Heading: SHIPPING & DELIVERY
settings.Content:
Revised as of: April 2022

This online purchase information governs purchases made through this website and does not apply to purchases made through independent retailers carrying behno products.

SHIPPING AND DELIVERY

  • All domestic (USA) and international orders are shipped via UPS, DHL or USPS for security reasons and online orders may require a signature upon delivery. These courier services have been chosen for their reliability, trust, and promptness.

  • In addition, some purchases may not be shipped to P.O. Boxes or APO/FPO addresses, which are not available through UPS or DHL.

  • To estimate the total delivery time for your purchase, please allow one to two business days to process your order for shipment, in addition to the time indicated by your preferred shipping method (i.e. UPS or USPS next day, second-day, ground.)

  • Orders are processed and delivered Monday through Friday, excluding holidays. behno is not responsible for unanticipated delays.

  • Please make sure your shipping address is correct. We are unable to re-direct orders once they have been dispatched. Orders that are returned because of an invalid address may be reshipped at your expense.

  • After an order has been delivered to the correct shipping address, we cannot be held responsible for lost or stolen packages. Any additional shipping costs are nonrefundable.

  • Exclusions apply on holidays and weekends. For additional shipping details, please see above.

DOMESTIC USA SHIPPING METHODS

  • Orders Over $250: Free Ground Shipping

  • Orders Under $250: Ground Shipping $12.00

  • Next-day $45.00: Please email clientservices@behno.com for expedited options.

  • Second-day $30.00: Please email clientservices@behno.com for expedited options.

INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING METHODS

  • All International Orders: $50 Ground Shipping

  • Duties and taxes are subject to payment depending on country of purchase. behno is not liable for additional duties or taxes.

TRACKING

  • A shipping confirmation is emailed to you as soon as your purchase has been shipped. We provide tracking numbers contained within the shipment notification email when your order leaves our distribution center and maintain a tracking number for each delivery.

  • If you have questions about the delivery of your purchase, please contact a Client Services Specialist via email at clientservices@behno.com.

settings.Heading: RETURNS & EXCHANGES
settings.Content:
Revised as of: April 2022

This online purchase information governs purchases made through this website and does not apply to purchases made through independent retailers carrying behno products.

DOMESTIC USA AND INTERNATIONAL RETURN POLICY

  • We hope you found exactly what you were looking for – and that you will cherish it over the years to come. However, behno would like to ensure your complete satisfaction.

  • behno is pleased to provide complimentary return shipping labels for domestic orders over $250. Complimentary return shipping labels are not provided for orders under $250 domestically in the USA or for any international orders.

  • All sale items, items that are marked down, or have “Final sale.” denoted on their product pages on www.behno.com are final sale. These items are not eligible for returns, exchanges, or store credit under any circumstances.

  • Purchases using the promo code THANKS, BEHNO40, and BF2019 are final sale and not eligible for returns, exchanges or store credit under any circumstances.

  • Personal promo codes created to honor 40% off full-priced orders are also final sale.

PRICE ADJUSTMENTS

  • If you placed an order within seven (7) days of a product’s price drop, you qualify for a price-adjustment. Please email clientservices@behno.com for assistance.

RETURN PROCESS

  • To begin the return process, request a return within seven (7) days of receiving your order by contacting clientservices@behno.com. If your request is submitted within seven (7) days of receiving your order, a Client Services Specialist will respond with a return authorization number.

  • Return packages must be postmarked no later than seven (7) days from the date you receive your return authorization.

  • Merchandise must be returned with original packaging and must be unused, unworn and in an unaltered condition. All original tickets must be attached and a copy of your packing list must be enclosed with your return authorization number clearly documented. behno reserves the right to refuse

  • the return of any merchandise that does not meet the above criteria. In such instances, behno will send the product(s) back at the customer’s expense.

  • Refunds will only be issued in the same form as payment and shipping costs are non-refundable. For multiple product orders, we kindly ask that the merchandise be returned in one consolidated package.

  • Pack your unused merchandise securely and ensure that the packing slip of your order is included inside your return box.

  • Once we have received and processed your return, you will be notified by email. Please allow 3-5 business days from the date your return is received by our warehouse for your refund.

EXCHANGE PROCESS

  • For an exchange of a product, please follow the return guidelines and place a new order online. Your refund will be processed within 3-5 business days from the date your return is received and your account will be charged once the exchange item has been shipped.

  • For further assistance please contact us at clientservices@behno.com Monday through Friday. We will get back to you at the earliest.

CHANGES/CANCELLATIONS

  • If you wish to cancel or modify your order, please send an email as soon as possible to clientservices@behno.com, and we will make every effort to accommodate your request. However, once an order has been processed there may be a chance that it has left the warehouse for shipment processing

  • and we may be unable to modify or cancel the order for any reason. In this case, please refer to our return policy and return your purchase once you have received it.

  • If you would like to purchase a different product, please visit our website or contact a behno online sales representative by emailing clientservices@behno.com.
